name: Quick Fruit and Citrus Barbecue Sauce
description: A mere few minutes of work and minimal ingredients can turn a rather ho-hum bottled barbecue sauce into serious eats.
recipeIngredient: 18 ounces bottled barbecue sauce (1 1/2 cups), preferably Bull's-Eye
1/8 teaspoon habanero hot sauce, plus more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium bowl, whisk together barbecue sauce, mango juice, pineapple juice, lemon juice, lime juice, honey, ginger, and habanero hot sauce. Season with additional hot sauce to taste. Use immediately or pour back in bottle and store in refrigerator for up to a month.
